channel.title: Pbscape Development
channel.description:
[center][b] [img]http://www.pbscape.net/download/file.php?logo=forum_logo.png[/img] Hello guys, This is Pbscpe, I have been working on this source for a good Two Months and tbh I think I did good. If you want to contact me about the server, Heres my contact info. Plus YouTube video below![/b][/center]
[center][b]Info to contact me: MSN Is my main instant messenger to talk to you MSN: Pblord7@sinzscape.net EMAIL: Pblord7@sinzscape.net [/b][/center]
[center][b]I am currently hosting my server 24/7, I will list some of the things I have done.
Fully working PVP Shop and Pk Point System. Donor Point System and Donor Point Shop. Fully working new currency for staff (A new twist on staff shops since there only able to option by spawning), with working read opition. Fully working custom minigame called Souls. You go into the portal and kill the monster for points. Fun pk is Castle Wars. (You get team capes theres just no taking flags) Most specs and animations are correct. Custom bosses, they hit high and are somewhat hard to kill. Fully working Dual Arena, No staking. Full working Fight Pits and Jad Minigame.
[center][b]I have been working on this server for a good 1.5 Months and its finally starting to workout nice.
Video Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6EXU1cTIvF4 [/b][center]
[i][b]-Pblord7[/b][/i]

item.title: Pbscape Development
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:364131”]Ah… That seems fair enough then.
Good luck on the project then.[/quote]

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Pbscape Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Ah… That seems fair enough then.
Good luck on the project then.

item.title: Pbscape Development
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:3, topic:364131”]The features sound nice; though its the customs, and the custom crowns that I’m going to have to not like about it mate. Plus the fact that the shops are over loaded with items for one to get something easy.

I can’t give that much positive feedback. However, good luck on the project mate.[/quote]

I am removing all the rares from normal shops ex: rare rings, rune c’bow etc.
Plus the crown is only on YOUR screen if your owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Pbscape Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The features sound nice; though its the customs, and the custom crowns that I’m going to have to not like about it mate. Plus the fact that the shops are over loaded with items for one to get something easy.

I can’t give that much positive feedback. However, good luck on the project mate.

Read full topic

@Pblord7 wrote:

[center]

Hello guys, This is Pbscpe, I have been working on this source for a good Two Months and tbh I think I did good. If you want to contact me about the server, Heres my contact info. Plus YouTube video below![/center]

[center]Info to contact me:
MSN Is my main instant messenger to talk to you
MSN: Pblord7@sinzscape.net
EMAIL: Pblord7@sinzscape.net
[/center]

[center][b]I am currently hosting my server 24/7, I will list some of the things I have done.

Fully working PVP Shop and Pk Point System.
Donor Point System and Donor Point Shop.
Fully working new currency for staff (A new twist on staff shops since there only able to option by spawning), with working read opition.
Fully working custom minigame called Souls. You go into the portal and kill the monster for points.
Fun pk is Castle Wars. (You get team capes theres just no taking flags)
Most specs and animations are correct.
Custom bosses, they hit high and are somewhat hard to kill.
Fully working Dual Arena, No staking.
Full working Fight Pits and Jad Minigame.

[center][b]I have been working on this server for a good 1.5 Months and its finally starting to workout nice.

Video Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6EXU1cTIvF4
